Name: Istanbul Ship Simulator
About the game: Istanbul Ship Simulator is a simple and fun ship simulation game located in the city of Istanbul. You can play all more than 20 challenging mission or choose any ship you like and sail at the coasts of Istanbul. There are two game modes in the game. First one is Missions and the othe one is Free Roam. - In Free Roam Mode,you can choose one of seven different ship and sail freely. - In Missions section, you can play more than twenty mission.
